# Analysis

Here, I'm going to show you a plot of miles per gallon (mpg) by vehicle weight in tons (wt)

```{r, fig1, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE}
library(plotly)

plot_ly(
  data = mtcars, 
  x = ~wt, 
  y = ~mpg
)

```
